title: recur method with int parameter and two calls

content.question: private int recur(int n) { if (n <= 1) { return 1; } else { return (recur(n - 2) + recur(n - 1)); } } What value will be returned by the call recur(4)?

skill.text: 3.C: Determine the result or output based on code that contains procedural abstractions.
